name: NVSDatabase
description: The "NVSDatabase" library is a useful tool for applications running on ESP32 and ESP8266 microcontrollers that require non-volatile storage capabilities. It abstracts the NVS API, making it easier to interact with the database and manipulate data. The library provides functions for storing, retrieving, and managing key-value pairs in the NVS database.
keywords: NVS Database, ESP32 Storage, ESP8266 NVS, Non-volatile Storage, NVS API, Key-Value Storage, ESP-IDF NVS, NVS Library, ronny, antoon, MetaHouse
